column4: my ubuntu 11.04 suddenly stopped wanting to connect to a shared directory on my network. the error messages said it failed to get the share list from the server.
is the server you're trying to connect to running windows? you might need to disable the windows firewall
have you tried opening the share with smb://192.xxx.xxx.xxx (ip address) in firefox and seeing if you can connect that way?
you can also do that in natilus probably, not sure
